name: OUTSMART
description:
'I like the idea of having to outsmart an enemy' - prototype tester on Coursera 'Love your unique chess-like take on the run base rouge-like, good job' - beta tester on Coursera 'A cool way to work with arts and textures' - beta tester on the Internet Instructions:

Reach the exit before the enemy kills you

Controls:

[WASD] or [Arrow keys] to navigate

Created by SOMOV KIRILL

Music by Eric Matyas
www.soundimage.org

Character's arts by overcrafted

Textures by yughues, SOMOV KIRILL
